text: hey everybody Jennifer from Tarle
speech and language with your

today's question is how do i say the
word pleasure or contentment and
happiness
the word is spelled PL EA SU RE
and the spelling really leads to the
confusion. The word is pronounced with
two beats or two syllables ple and then
zher so to say this word correctly,
start by saying the P sound by pressing
your lips together then move to the l by
touching the tip of your tongue to the
back of your top front teeth and your
lips are going to open slightly then
you're going to move to the eh vowel by
opening your mouth a little bit more
ple ple next add the zher syllable do
this by rounding your lips for this ZH
sound and make sure that your voice
box is on and moving to give that sound
voicing zh  now you're going to end with
the er vowel in most cases most people
are going to have to move the tip of
their tongue down slightly towards the
bottom the bottom of their mouths to add
this or sound let's put this all
together pler zher ple zher pleasure
let's give it a try pleasure pleasure
pleasure
it is a pleasure to work with you. Give
